name: Something's Fishy (curttremblay)
description:
Pitch

"Another clammy evening at the bottom of the ocean. It's your job to keep the streets clean for another night..by shooting any trash that gets in your way."
---------------------------------------------------------

Game Details

My submission for Fanshawe College's GDP2021-22 Final Game Jam.

Take control of an underwater detective to find and shoot 5 cans that have been scattered across the scene.

Despite the noir tone of the above tagline, none of the content within the game is meant to be taken seriously, as the theme was selected as a way to test out different shaders and fit in multiple Simpsons references.

More information about this and other projects can be found at: https://www.curttremblay.com/

I can also be contacted via email at : curttremblaygames@gmail.com

---------------------------------------------------------

Controls

W/A/S/D : Walk
Shift + W/A/S/D: Run
Right Click : Enter Aiming Mode
Left Click: Shoot (while aiming)
Q: Waiting animation (can also be triggered by not pressing anything for a number of seconds)

Videos





---------------------------------------------------------

Concept Art Design for an old man character who would yell at you after completing the mission. The character didn't make it into the game, but his voice file still plays to shame you for blindly shooting things just because an in-game HUD tells you to. Original artwork of the player character. The in game model is intended as a placeholder for this design.
